title: How Many Episodes of Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 Are Left?
description: Disney’s highly-awaited sequel series, Wizards Beyond Waverly Place is finally here. A spin-off of Wizards of Waverly Place, the show dives into Justin Russo’s journey, as he comes to terms with mortality while spending time with his family. Things get interesting when his sister Alex brings a wizard-in-training, who looks to him for guidance. Now, […] The post How Many Episodes of Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 Are Left? appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Ayesha Zafar
excerpt: Wondering how many episodes are there in Disney's Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 and their streaming details? Find the answers here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Disney’s highly-awaited sequel series, Wizards Beyond Waverly Place is finally here. A spin-off of Wizards of Waverly Place, the show dives into Justin Russo’s journey, as he comes to terms with mortality while spending time with his family. Things get interesting when his sister Alex brings a wizard-in-training, who looks to him for guidance. Now, fans are eager to find out how many episodes are packed into Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 as well as the streaming details. So, let’s explore all the release schedule details for the debut season of Wizards Beyond Waverly Place. How many episodes does Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 have? Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 has a total of 10 episodes. The first two episodes premiered on Disney Channel on October 29 at 8:00 p.m. ET. Meanwhile, two new episodes, including a Halloween special, will air back-to-back on Disney Channel on October 30, 2024. Then, from November 8, 2024, the rest of the six episodes will shift to Fridays at 8:00 p.m. ET, featuring two episodes each week. Check out the episode list below: Episode 1: Everything is Not What It Seems (October 29, 2024) Episode 2: Mortal Vibes Only (October 29, 2024) Episode 3: Saved by the Spell (October 30, 2024) Episode 4: Something Wizard This Way Comes (October 30, 2024 Episode 5: Wizards Just Wand to Have Fun (November 8, 2024) Episode 6: The Legend of Creepy Follows (November 8, 2024) Episode 7: We’re Gonna Need A Bigger Float (November 15, 2024) Episode 8: You Can’t Handle The Tooth (November 15, 2024) Episode 9: Wiz-Taken Identity (November 22, 2024) Episode 10: Ain’t Gnome Party Like A Wizard Party (November 22, 2024) Is Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 available to stream? Yes, Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 is available to stream online via Disney Plus. The first 8 episodes will land on the streaming platform on October 30, that is, a day after the first two episodes will air on Disney Channel. The show follows Justin Russo (David Henrie), as he navigates life with his wife Giada, and sons, Roman and Milo. Soon, everything changes when his sister Alex (Selena Gomez), arrives with Billie, a budding wizard in need of help. Now, Justin has to sharpen his magical skills to assist her while balancing his everyday life and protecting the Wizarding World. During an interview with Variety, Selena Gomez shared her thoughts on filming the Wizards of Waverly Place spinoff. She said, “It truly felt like coming home. I’m thrilled to have the chance to share this childhood treasure with new little ones out there.”
html:
Disney’s highly-awaited sequel series, Wizards Beyond Waverly Place is finally here. A spin-off of Wizards of Waverly Place, the show dives into Justin Russo’s journey, as he comes to terms with mortality while spending time with his family. Things get interesting when his sister Alex brings a wizard-in-training, who looks to him for guidance. Now, fans are eager to find out how many episodes are packed into Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 as well as the streaming details.

So, let’s explore all the release schedule details for the debut season of Wizards Beyond Waverly Place.

How many episodes does Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 have?

Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 has a total of 10 episodes.

The first two episodes premiered on Disney Channel on October 29 at 8:00 p.m. ET. Meanwhile, two new episodes, including a Halloween special, will air back-to-back on Disney Channel on October 30, 2024. Then, from November 8, 2024, the rest of the six episodes will shift to Fridays at 8:00 p.m. ET, featuring two episodes each week.

Check out the episode list below:

  • Episode 1: Everything is Not What It Seems (October 29, 2024)
  • Episode 2: Mortal Vibes Only (October 29, 2024)
  • Episode 3: Saved by the Spell (October 30, 2024)
  • Episode 4: Something Wizard This Way Comes (October 30, 2024
  • Episode 5: Wizards Just Wand to Have Fun (November 8, 2024)
  • Episode 6: The Legend of Creepy Follows (November 8, 2024)
  • Episode 7: We’re Gonna Need A Bigger Float (November 15, 2024)
  • Episode 8: You Can’t Handle The Tooth (November 15, 2024)
  • Episode 9: Wiz-Taken Identity (November 22, 2024)
  • Episode 10: Ain’t Gnome Party Like A Wizard Party (November 22, 2024)

Is Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 available to stream?

Yes, Wizards Beyond Waverly Place Season 1 is available to stream online via Disney Plus.

The first 8 episodes will land on the streaming platform on October 30, that is, a day after the first two episodes will air on Disney Channel.

The show follows Justin Russo (David Henrie), as he navigates life with his wife Giada, and sons, Roman and Milo. Soon, everything changes when his sister Alex (Selena Gomez), arrives with Billie, a budding wizard in need of help. Now, Justin has to sharpen his magical skills to assist her while balancing his everyday life and protecting the Wizarding World.

During an interview with Variety, Selena Gomez shared her thoughts on filming the Wizards of Waverly Place spinoff. She said, “It truly felt like coming home. I’m thrilled to have the chance to share this childhood treasure with new little ones out there.”
